comments.body: So, weird that this is all ascii but I've read that it was done that way by purpose to allow operators to fix archives manually...

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +21,25 @@   *
   * struct header {
   * char name[100];     // TarConstants.NAMELEN    - offset   0
   * char mode[8];       // TarConstants.MODELEN    - offset 100
   * char uid[8];        // TarConstants.UIDLEN     - offset 108
